title: Intro_Start
body:
<<setsprite Left Talia neutral>> <<setsprite Right Carabosse neutral>> <<setname Left Talia>> <<setname Right Carabosse>>R:Ohohohoho! Your princess is done for! The prophecy has come true!
R:On her eighteenth birthday, the princess shall prick her finger on a cursed spinning wheel and sleep for all eternity!
And it has come true, thanks to the skills of I, the evil fairy Carabosse! Ohohohohoho!
L:Princess Briar Rose... Asleep for all eternity...?
L:Not on my watch!
L:I'll find her true love! And bring him to her! And make him kiss her! And she'll wake up!
R: Ha! Don't make me laugh! You know as well as I that the Princess hasn't dated.
R:But, just in case, I might as well kill all the princes in the kingdom. You know, to stop you from succeeding.
L:I'll save all of the princes too!
